Nightlight: Nightlight smiled and took the quills, she did a large look at=
 ELita and quickly left. While she walks owards the Exit. While she was rea=
ching the exit nighlight typed a highly encoded message at Tucson "I'm look=
ing for Rodimus... Take care of elita, and trust in what I'll do"
  To: nbw=
rpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Wed, 31 Aug 2011 22:3=
8:41 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        









=



Straight Shot smiles as she listens to Nightlight.  She then plucks a fe=
w quills from her armor and gives them to her.
" Ya might need these, they =
go in but they don't come out that way.  Just on case things go south.

Per=
petually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 31, 2011, at 10:29 PM, Ai=
rshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
   =
   

      



 nighlight:
 
Nightlight smiled and said  while she glenty t=
ouched elita"It's what i needed to know, please stay with her... i would as=
k Nightshift care her if he was here"
 
"What's happening mom?"said Elite w=
ith yawn
 
"all will be all right, my dear"said Nighlight"sleep"
 Elita fel=
t sleep once more, Nightlight kissed her and she stood up and slowly left t=
he room To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Wed, 3=
1 Aug 2011 21:36:38 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










   =
     












Straight Shot carries a worried expression on her face as=
 she looks down to Elita, gently stroking her fur with a tender hand.
" She=
's in very good hands Nightlight.  Of course I'll be sure she has someone t=
a take good care of her.  And you should see how Tucson interacts with her.=
  Once he holds her, he's not about ta put her down too fast.  And despite =
his temper, he's a real softy when it comes ta being around youngsters Elit=
a's age.  I know what he's gonna do if he and Talon have ta adopt Elita, he=
's gonna spoil her rotten.  All dads wanna spoil their kids, especially if =
they consider them " Daddy's little girl."
"Look at me, I wanna do the same=
 thing, I just wanna hold her and never let go.   And if anyone is gonna ma=
ke phenomenal parents it's Talon and Tucson.  I know how much it would mean=
 ta both of them ta have a young bot look up to them and depend on them for=
 guidance and protection, because that's what parents do and I know a great=
 pair of parents when I see them."
She smiles to Talon as she makes her las=
t statement.

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 31, 2011=
, at 8:16 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 


=

    
      
      
      



nightlight:
 
"I have things to do"said the f=
emme"and I need to be sure that Elita will be ok, he wants us then I plan t=
o find him before he comes... dont ask me more; less you know, and elita wi=
ll be safer "
 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date=
: Wed, 31 Aug 2011 09:46:56 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.





=





        












Straight Shot falls off her seat with her mouth w=
ide open.
" Yeah, what Talon said, what're ya saying?  Nightlight, things w=
ill be okay I'm sure they will."

Perpetually on the move and constantly bu=
sy. 
On Aug 31, 2011, at 12:21 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@hotmail.c=
om> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      




 Talom/Nightlight:
 
Ni=
ghlight looked at Talon and Straightshot and Talon said "That's true... We =
belive that is that or something is controlling him... "
 
Nightlight said =
almost in low voice "If something happens me, will you and Tucson care Elit=
a?"
 
Talon looked surpriced at Nightlight and said "What are you saying?"
=
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Tue, 30 Aug 20=
11 22:53:48 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        


=










Straight Shot enters the room with Talon and is careful not to wa=
ke Elita.  She smiles while looking to Nightlight and the cub.
" I can just=
 see it now, all of us together, watching the young bots develop Their skil=
ls together..  Elita would really love ta have someone ta pal around with. =
 I bet in the near future that will happen.  And Nightlight, don't worry, T=
icson is out there looking for Wheelie and I bet he'll find Rodimus too.  I=
 got ta thinking about things and I realized that the shell program was lon=
g since gone a while ago.   I bet that Dark Rodimus is a copy of the real R=
odimus.  And if they're out there, Tucson will find them.  Isn't that right=
, Talon?"

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 30, 2011, a=
t 8:18 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



  =
  
      
      
      



Nightlight/Elita:
 
Talon smiled and glenty hit =
the door and feminine voice said "Come in"
 
Nightlight was sat down in one=
 bed when Talon came in, and elita was deeply sleep. 
 
Talon came in and s=
at down close to Nighlight whose was looking at the floor.
 
To: nbwrpg@yah=
oogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Tue, 30 Aug 2011 08:29:31 -0=
400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        












Stra=
ight Shot transforms into her robot mode and follows Talon to Nightlight's =
quarters.  She was happy to know that her suggestion was actually considere=
d by Leo Prime, about getting the femme bots together as a team.
" I really=
 didn't think Leo would go for my idea of letting the femme bots work as a =
team.  He sure surprised me."

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.=
 
On Aug 30, 2011, at 12:46 AM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...>=
 wrote:






 



    
      
      
      



Talon:
 
"Let's go then "sa=
ind the female while she walked towards Nighlgiht's quaters  
 To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2011 23:53:26 =
-0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        












St=
raight Shot nods. 
" Sure.  Let's go.  She'll be happy ta know that Master =
Nightshift is accepting her and Elita as his students."

Perpetually on the=
 move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, at 11:38 PM, Airshadow Nightst=
ar <airly2002@...> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      



T=
alon:
 
Looking at straight shot "Do you want to come with me and pay a vis=
it at Nightlight?"
 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
From: magicquartz@...=

Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2011 23:31:54 -0400
Subject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.
=










        












Nightshift nods as he gets Talon's transmiss=
ion.
" No problem, I'm flexible."
Perpetually on the move and constantly bu=
sy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, at 11:03 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@hotmail.c=
om> wrote:






 



    
      
      
      



Talon:
 
"I think that E=
lita is too young to train outside the ark"said Talon
 
To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com
From: magicquartz@...
Date: Mon, 29 Aug 2011 19:24:03 -0400
S=
ubject: Re: Lessons to be Learned.










        












Nightshif=
t thinks for a moment. If anything, Tucson would rely on ground tracking to=
 find Wheelie.  
" Most likely his field track'n tactics.  That means he's =
gonna land at the area and attempt ta follow Wheelie on foot.  He knows how=
 ta identify a bot just by foot and tire tracks alone. One more thing, he's=
 got sharp senses and he was promised he'd be able ta go it alone.  Get dow=
nwind of him and he won't be too happy.  Even I know better then ta mess wi=
th him."


Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
On Aug 29, 2011, a=
t 6:28 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:






 



    
=
      
      
      > <OLD>

>

> Nightshift nods to Leo's request.

>

> "=
 School will have ta open a little later than expected.  Okay Leo, I'm on

=
> it."

>

> He transforms into SUV mode and rolls off toward Polar Claw.

=
>

> " Hey Leo, ya might wanna make sure Tucson doesn't see ya!  He gets wi=
nd

> that you didn't let em do that mission on his own, he's gonna see tha=
t as an

> act of distrust.  Then he's really gonna be in a bad mood.  Trus=
t me, I

> know.  Ratchet was the same way.  Like dad like son."



<NEW>

=


"I know." LEO PRIME said over the radio "But sometimes things are far

mo=
re important than his anger."



When NIGHTSHIFT arrived at POLAR CLAW's lo=
cation he was already

standing with RAMULUS and the group's tactical exper=
t PROWL, they were

all in robot mode standing at the shuttle.



WOLFGANG =
was standing off to the side manipulating something. "Its

fueled up and re=
ady to go." WLFGANG said as he stowed an energon

dispensing unit in its ho=
lster.



"Good!" POLAR CLAW said. he was easily the largest of the group. =
While

not as tall as RODIMUS or TUSCON were, he was still broad and massiv=
e,

giving he appearance of great size and ferocity.



POLAR CLAW turned t=
o look at NIGHTSHIFT, "You're here because you know

Tuscon better than we.=
" There was a dismissive grunt as he glanced at

a PADD he had in his hand,=
 it is ohviously the notes and mission

parameters he recieved from LEO PRI=
ME.



"He's gone out alone. Sensors showed that he was going off in the

d=
irection of that jungle where Rodimus is suppose to be." There was

another=
 pause from POLAR CLAW, "The same direction Wheelie took as

well."



POLA=
R CLAW lowered his padd as he looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every scan we

have of=
 that place shows it is a dense jungle, his inhanced senses

will not help =
him much there. What tactic do you think he will use to

locate Wheelie?"

=

Preston

r>
><br>
> " Hey Leo, ya might wanna make sure Tucson doesn't see ya!=
  He gets wind<br>
> that you didn't let em do that mission on his own, =
he's gonna see that as an<br>
> act of distrust.  Then he's really gonna=
 be in a bad mood.  Trust me, I<br>
> know.  Ratchet was the same way.  =
Like dad like son."<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br>
"I know." LEO PRIME said =
over the radio "But sometimes things are far<br>
more important than his an=
ger."<br>
<br>
When NIGHTSHIFT arrived at POLAR CLAW's location he was alre=
ady<br>
standing with RAMULUS and the group's tactical expert PROWL, they w=
ere<br>
all in robot mode standing at the shuttle.<br>
<br>
WOLFGANG was st=
anding off to the side manipulating something. "Its<br>
fueled up and ready=
 to go." WLFGANG said as he stowed an energon<br>
dispensing unit in its ho=
lster.<br>
<br>
"Good!" POLAR CLAW said. he was easily the largest of the g=
roup. While<br>
not as tall as RODIMUS or TUSCON were, he was still broad a=
nd massive,<br>
giving he appearance of great size and ferocity.<br>
<br>
P=
OLAR CLAW turned to look at NIGHTSHIFT, "You're here because you know<br>
T=
uscon better than we." There was a dismissive grunt as he glanced at<br>
a =
PADD he had in his hand, it is ohviously the notes and mission<br>
paramete=
rs he recieved from LEO PRIME.<br>
<br>
"He's gone out alone. Sensors showe=
d that he was going off in the<br>
direction of that jungle where Rodimus i=
s suppose to be." There was<br>
another pause from POLAR CLAW, "The same di=
rection Wheelie took as<br>
well."<br>
<br>
POLAR CLAW lowered his padd as =
he looked at NIGHTSHIFT, "Every scan we<br>
have of that place shows it is =
a dense jungle, his inhanced senses<br>
will not help him much there. What =
tactic do you think he will use to<br>
locate Wheelie?"<br>
